response:
Marissa wants an overall average speed of 4 mph.  
- She has already walked 6 miles in 2 hours.  
- To average 4 mph over 12 miles, her total time must be \(12 \text{ mi} \div 4 \text{ mph} = 3\) hours.  
- She has 1 hour left to walk the remaining 6 miles, so she needs a speed of \(6 \text{ mi} \div 1 \text{ hr} = 6\) mph.
